isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - 12/06/1994 and After - OPERATION - AIR CONDITIONING

svcproc.title: AIR CONDITIONING
svcproc.para: To properly air condition the cab in warm weather, close the driver floor dump by pulling the FLOOR AIR knob out. Close all windows, push the A/C button in and set the TEMPERATURE CONTROL knob to COLD. For maximum cooling, move the FAN switch to HI. (The fan must be on for A/C operation.) Place the AIR OUTLET knob on the PANEL position, then adjust the instrument panel outlets as desired. To assure maximum air flow from the upper left outlet, be certain the FLOOR AIR knob is pulled all the way out.
To remove stale air or smoke while air conditioner is operating, you may want to open a vent window for a short period of time.
